thread.title: Pentagon Says Civilians Were Likely Killed in Yemen Raid
thread.title_full: Pentagon Says Civilians Were Likely Killed in Yemen Raid - WSJ

author: Ben Kesling
title: Pentagon Says Civilians Were Likely Killed in Yemen Raid
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The U.S. military said Wednesday that civilians were likely killed during a Navy SEAL raid in Yemen on Sunday, an operation that also claimed the life of an American sailor and wounded three others.

Local residents said Sunday that about 20 civilians were killed in the fighting that centered on an al Qaeda compound in the interior of the country. Images purporting to show the bodies of several children killed in the raid...
